venue.address_2: Actual address is 550 but wrong on Google
venue.name: Seacoast Family YMCA

item.description:
We're happy to announce that Cheri Perry will be coming to Portsmouth earlier on Saturday March 20th to offer a Yoga workshop designed specifically for paddlers prior to our Kayak Safety Bracing & Rolling pool session. See Cheri's Yoga for Paddlers Workshop description below

Join Cheri Perry for a two hour workshop on how Yoga can increase your paddling performance. Start a balanced Yoga program that can evolve into a home practice. We will do yoga poses that encourage rotation, spinal lengthening, hamstring opening, and back-bending, accompanied with a discussion as to how this pertains to kayaking.


Cost $30.00

Make your check payable to Kayak Ways LLC and bring the check with you to the class. Of course cash is also accepted.

Please RSVP ASAP as Space is limited.

What to Bring: Yoga mat (we have extra if you donâ€™t own one), Strap (kayak tie down will work well) Dress in comfortable stretchy clothes. The workshop will be held in one of the small aerobics rooms on the opposite side of the building from pool.

If you have any questions please contact Cheri at cheri@kayakways.net
item.name: Yoga for Paddlers Workshop with Yoga Instructor Cheri Perry at Portsmouth YMCA
